entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
